name: Project Manager IT / Business Engagement Manager
description:
Looking for IT professional with experiance of working with Sales & Marketing Teams in pharmeceutical or FMCG businesses.

Analytics team in Dr. Reddy’s works on data driven decision support problems across functions and business units. Business Analysts in DPEx work closely with the business/functional teams to empathize and address a business problem with an analytics/technology solution opportunity. Role requires the individual to play the role of key liaison between the business teams, partners in solution development team and DPEx team members across the globe. The success in the role is to effectively identify the right solution and see it all the way through to adoption and benefit realization.

Role Responsibilities:

  • Work with the business/functional users to understand the business decision making and sales & marketing process challenges to recommend data-led solutions;
  • Leverage advanced data analytics to address the business needs and create business impact;
  • Design business intelligence/data science solutions in collaboration with technology architects to address this need;
  • Develop in-house analytics knowledge-base for faster, better problem solving and horizontal scale out in to other markets/functions of need;
  • Ability to use storytelling technique(s) to share findings and insights from data for business usе;
  • Project management support for projects.

Technical Requirements:

  • Experience working on Customer analytics, Sales Force Excellence, Sales & Marketing analytics across sub-functional areas (Customer segmentation, profiling, brand performance analytics, promo/campaign planning and effectiveness tracking etc.);
  • Strong affiliation to quantitative methods and data analysis to deliver business insights;
  • Exposure to visual analytics (Tableau, MicroStrategy, Spotfire etc.), advanced analytics application (R, SAS, Python etc.) and data mining/ML analytics techniques a big plus;
  • Exhibits confidence and an extensive knowledge of emerging industry practices when solving business problems;
  • Knowledge in Project management background and familiar with PMI project methodologies and SDLC.

Operating Network:

Internal: All functions and teams within the organization across Russia and CoE teams based in India.

External: Vendors, implementation partners, knowledge networks.

Key Skills and Experience:

  • Strategic thinking, innovation, strategy development and execution, planning and decision-making in a in a complex organization;
  • Transformational mindset ant high level of customer Centricity;
  • Strong knowledge of IT industry standards and best practices to develop organizational capability assessment (people, processes, technology, knowledge) and process improvement models;
  • Strong knowledge of formulating data governance objectives and goals;
  • Ability to Communicate and inspire confidence at a senior level with technical and non-technical audiences.

Key Personal Attributes:

  • Good communication skills, reasoning and analytical ability;
  • Must be collaborative in approach and a team player;
  • Very good at networking and influencing;
  • Willingness to learn new concepts, tools and techniques related to the subject.
branded_description:
<style type="text/css">
.tmplt_hh {
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
    overflow: hidden;
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    
}

.tmplt_hh-clearfix:before,
.tmplt_hh-clearfix:after {
    content: "";
    display: table;
}

.tmplt_hh-clearfix:after {
    clear: both;
}

.tmplt_hh h1,
.tmplt_hh h2,
.tmplt_hh h3,
.tmplt_hh h4,
.tmplt_hh h5,
.tmplt_hh h6,
.tmplt_hh p,
.tmplt_hh blockquote,
.tmplt_hh pre,
.tmplt_hh a,
.tmplt_hh abbr,
.tmplt_hh acronym,
.tmplt_hh address,
.tmplt_hh big,
.tmplt_hh cite,
.tmplt_hh code,
.tmplt_hh img,
.tmplt_hh ol,
.tmplt_hh ul,
.tmplt_hh li,
.tmplt_hh footer,
.tmplt_hh header {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    border: 0;
    font-size: 100%;
    font: inherit;
    vertical-align: baseline;
}

.tmplt_hh ul,
.tmplt_hh ul ul {
    list-style: none;
}


/*.b-vacancy-desc {
    overflow: visible;
}*/

.hht-vacancydescription {
    padding: 0px;
}

.tmplt_hh .l-cell,
.tmplt_hh .l-paddings {
    padding: 0px;
}

.tmplt_hh .b-vacancy-desc,
.tmplt_hh .l-paddings {
    line-height: inherit;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ol li b,
.tmplt_hh-content ol li strong,
.tmplt_hh-content ol li p b,
.tmplt_hh-content ol li p strong,
.tmplt_hh-content ul li b,
.tmplt_hh-content ul li strong,
.tmplt_hh-content ul li p b,
.tmplt_hh-content ul li p strong {
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: inherit!important;
    font-family: inherit!important;
    line-height: inherit!important;
    color: inherit!important;
    margin: 0!important;
    padding: 0!important;
    background: none!important;
    display: inline!important;
    text-transform: none;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ol li p,
.tmplt_hh-content ul li p {
    font-weight: normal!important;
    margin: 0!important;
}

.tmplt_hh-content p b,
.tmplt_hh-content p strong {
    display: inline!important;
    margin: 0!important;
}

.tmplt_hh_flex {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -moz-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: flex;
    -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    -ms-flex-pack: start;
    justify-content: flex-start;
}

/* Styles slider */

.tmplt_hh-swiper-container {
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    /* Fix of Webkit flickering */
    z-index: 1;
}

.swiper-container-no-flexbox .swiper-slide {
    float: left;
}

.swiper-container-vertical > .swiper-wrapper {
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -moz-box-orient: vertical;
    -ms-flex-direction: column;
    -webkit-flex-direction: column;
    flex-direction: column;
}

.tmplt_hh-swiper-container .swiper-wrapper {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    z-index: 1;
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -moz-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-transition-property: -webkit-transform;
    -moz-transition-property: -moz-transform;
    -o-transition-property: -o-transform;
    -ms-transition-property: -ms-transform;
    transition-property: transform;
    -webkit-box-sizing: content-box;
    -moz-box-sizing: content-box;
    box-sizing: content-box;
}

.swiper-container-android .swiper-slide,
.swiper-wrapper {
    -webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0, 0);
    -moz-transform: translate3d(0px, 0, 0);
    -o-transform: translate(0px, 0px);
    -ms-transform: translate3d(0px, 0, 0);
    transform: translate3d(0px, 0, 0);
}

.swiper-container-multirow > .swiper-wrapper {
    -webkit-box-lines: multiple;
    -moz-box-lines: multiple;
    -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
    -webkit-flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.swiper-container-free-mode > .swiper-wrapper {
    -webkit-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
    -moz-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
    -ms-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
    -o-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
    transition-timing-function: ease-out;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

.tmplt_hh-swiper-container .swiper-slide {
    -webkit-flex-shrink: 0;
    -ms-flex: 0 0 auto;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}

.tmplt_hh-swiper-container .swiper-slide img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
}

/* Auto Height */

.swiper-container-autoheight,
.swiper-container-autoheight .swiper-slide {
    height: auto;
}

.swiper-container-autoheight .swiper-wrapper {
    -webkit-box-align: start;
    -ms-flex-align: start;
    -webkit-align-items: flex-start;
    align-items: flex-start;
    -webkit-transition-property: -webkit-transform, height;
    -moz-transition-property: -moz-transform;
    -o-transition-property: -o-transform;
    -ms-transition-property: -ms-transform;
    transition-property: transform, height;
}


/* Pagination Styles */

.tmplt_hh-swiper-pagination {
    text-align: center;
    -webkit-transition: 300ms;
    -moz-transition: 300ms;
    -o-transition: 300ms;
    transition: 300ms;
    -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
    -ms-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
    -o-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
    z-index: 10;
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 26px;
    width: 100%;
    font-size: 0;
    line-height: 0;
}


/* Bullets */

.swiper-pagination-bullet {
    width: 13px;
    height: 13px;
    display: inline-block;
    border-radius: 100%;
    background: #dcdcdc;
    cursor: pointer;
    margin: 0 3px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
    background: #fff;
}

.tmplt_hh-inner {
    padding-left: 7.2%;
    padding-right: 7.2%;
}

.tmplt_hh-header {
    padding-top: 37px;
    padding-bottom: 36px;
}

.tmplt_hh-header p {
    color: #5225b5;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 24px;
    line-height: 36px;
    float: left;
}

.tmplt_hh-header svg {
    float: right;
    width: 196px;
    height: 43px;
}

img.tmplt_hh-banner {
    width: 100%;
    display: block;
}


/* Styles content */

.tmplt_hh-content {
    padding-top: 15px;
    padding-bottom: 37px;
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
    -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: 0 auto;
    color: #646464;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 19px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #b9b9b9;
}

.tmplt_hh-content strong,
.tmplt_hh-content b {
    display: inline-block;
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 22px;
    color: #5225b5;
}

.tmplt_hh-content p,
.tmplt_hh-content strong,
.tmplt_hh-content b {
    margin: 34px 0 0;
}

.tmplt_hh .tmplt_hh-content ul,
.tmplt_hh .tmplt_hh-content ul ul {
    list-style: none;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ol {
    list-style: decimal inside;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ul,
.tmplt_hh-content ol ol {
    margin-left: 14px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ol ul {
    margin-left: 28px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ul,
.tmplt_hh-content ol {
    margin-top: 27px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ul ul,
.tmplt_hh-content ol ul {
    margin-top: 8px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ul li,
.tmplt_hh-content ol li {
    position: relative;
    margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ul>li:before {
    content: '\2022';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: -14px;
    color: #5225b5;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 21px;
}

.tmplt_hh-icons {
    padding-top: 46px;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon {
    position: relative;
    width: 33.33%;
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
    -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin-bottom: 66px;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon svg,
.tmplt_hh-icon img {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    margin: auto;
    display: block;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon span {
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 20px;
    left: 76px;
    top: 50%;
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%);
    -ms-transform: translateY(-50%);
    -o-transform: translateY(-50%);
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    position: absolute;
    display: block;
    max-width: 245px;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon3 {
    left: 5%;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon6 {
    left: 5%;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon8 span {
    max-width: 225px;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon-img {
    width: 70px;
    height: 70px;
     
    position: relative;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon svg {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
     position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    display: block; 
}

 
.tmplt_hh-note {
    background: #f7f7f7;
    padding-top: 40px;
    padding-bottom: 48px;
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 14px;
    color: #c4c4c4;
    text-align: justify;
    margin-top: -12px;
    letter-spacing: -0.1px;
    border-top: 1px solid #b9b9b9;
}


/* responsive */

.tmplt_hh-inner {
    padding-left: 6.19%;
    padding-right: 6.19%;
}

.tmplt_hh-header {
    padding-top: 28px;
    padding-bottom: 36px;
}

.tmplt_hh-header p {
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 36px;
    position: relative;
    top: 11px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content {
    padding-top: 2px;
    padding-bottom: 33px;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 17px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content strong,
.tmplt_hh-content b {
    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 21px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content p,
.tmplt_hh-content strong,
.tmplt_hh-content b {
    margin: 35px 0 4px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ul,
.tmplt_hh-content ol ol {
    margin-left: 13px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ol ul {
    margin-left: 26px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ul,
.tmplt_hh-content ol {
    margin-top: 27px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ul ul,
.tmplt_hh-content ol ul {
    margin-top: 7px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ul li,
.tmplt_hh-content ol li {
    margin-bottom: 7px;
}

.tmplt_hh-content ul>li:before {
    left: -13px;
    font-size: 21px;
}

.tmplt_hh-icons {
    padding: 46px 5% 1px;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon {
    width: 50%;
    margin-bottom: 66px;
    left: 0;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon1 {
    order: 0;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon2 {
    order: 6;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon3 {
    order: 5;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon4 {
    order: 2;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon5 {
    order: 1;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon6 {
    order: 7;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon7 {
    order: 4;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon8 {
    order: 3;
}

.tmplt_hh-icon span {
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 17px;
    left: 86px;
    top: 50%;
    max-width: 208px;
}

.tmplt_hh-note {
    padding-top: 21px;
    padding-bottom: 26px;
    font-size: 11px;
    line-height: 13px;
    margin-top: -23px;
}    

@media screen and (max-width: 699px) {

    .tmplt_hh-header {
        padding: 7px 1.99% 22px 3.39%;
    }

    .tmplt_hh-header p {
        font-size: 18px;
        line-height: 22px;
        width: 100px;
    }    

    .tmplt_hh-header svg {
        position: relative;
        top: 27px;
        width: 137px;
    }

    .tmplt_hh-swiper-pagination {
        bottom: 11px;
    }

    .swiper-pagination-bullet {
        width: 12px;
        height: 12px;
    }

    .tmplt_hh-content {
        font-size: 12px;
        line-height: 15px; 
        -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;    
            box-sizing: border-box;  
        width: 100%;
        padding: 0% 11.5% 6.2%;
    }

    .tmplt_hh-content p,
    .tmplt_hh-content strong,
    .tmplt_hh-content b {
        margin: 21px 0 4px;
    }

    .tmplt_hh-content strong,
    .tmplt_hh-content b {
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: 17px;
    }
    
    .tmplt_hh-content ul, .tmplt_hh-content ol {
        margin-top: 16px;
        margin-left: 11px;
    }

    .tmplt_hh-content ul li, .tmplt_hh-content ol li {
        margin-bottom: 8px;
    }

    .tmplt_hh-content ul>li:before {
        left: -12px;
        top: 2px;
    }

    .tmplt_hh-icons {
        -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        padding: 31px 3% 25px;
    }

    .tmplt_hh-icon {
        width: 280px;
        margin-bottom: 25px;
        -webkit-box-ordinal-group: 1;
        -ms-flex-order: 0;
        order: 0;
    }

    .tmplt_hh-icon-img {
        width: 63px;
        height: 63px;
    }

    .tmplt_hh-icon span {
        left: 77px;
        line-height: 16px;
    }

    .tmplt_hh-note {
        padding: 18px 2% 21px 3.4%;
    }
}
</style>

        <div class="tmplt_hh-content tmplt_hh-inner">
            <p><strong>Looking for IT professional with experiance of working with Sales & Marketing Teams in pharmeceutical or FMCG businesses.</strong> </p> <p>Analytics team in Dr. Reddy’s works on data driven decision support problems across functions and business units. Business Analysts in DPEx work closely with the business/functional teams to empathize and address a business problem with an analytics/technology solution opportunity. Role requires the individual to play the role of key liaison between the business teams, partners in solution development team and DPEx team members across the globe. The success in the role is to effectively identify the right solution and see it all the way through to adoption and benefit realization.</p> <p><strong>Role Responsibilities:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Work with the business/functional users to understand the business decision making and sales & marketing process challenges to recommend data-led solutions;</li> <li>Leverage advanced data analytics to address the business needs and create business impact;</li> <li>Design business intelligence/data science solutions in collaboration with technology architects to address this need;</li> <li>Develop in-house analytics knowledge-base for faster, better problem solving and horizontal scale out in to other markets/functions of need;</li> <li>Ability to use storytelling technique(s) to share findings and insights from data for business usе;</li> <li>Project management support for projects.</li> </ul> <p><strong>Technical Requirements:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Experience working on Customer analytics, Sales Force Excellence, Sales & Marketing analytics across sub-functional areas (Customer segmentation, profiling, brand performance analytics, promo/campaign planning and effectiveness tracking etc.);</li> <li>Strong affiliation to quantitative methods and data analysis to deliver business insights;</li> <li>Exposure to visual analytics (Tableau, MicroStrategy, Spotfire etc.), advanced analytics application (R, SAS, Python etc.) and data mining/ML analytics techniques a big plus;</li> <li>Exhibits confidence and an extensive knowledge of emerging industry practices when solving business problems;</li> <li>Knowledge in Project management background and familiar with PMI project methodologies and SDLC.</li> </ul> <p><strong>Operating Network:</strong></p> <p><strong>Internal: </strong>All functions and teams within the organization across Russia and CoE teams based in India.</p> <p><strong>External:</strong> Vendors, implementation partners, knowledge networks.</p> <p><strong>Key Skills and Experience:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Strategic thinking, innovation, strategy development and execution, planning and decision-making in a in a complex organization;</li> <li>Transformational mindset ant high level of customer Centricity;</li> <li>Strong knowledge of IT industry standards and best practices to develop organizational capability assessment (people, processes, technology, knowledge) and process improvement models;</li> <li>Strong knowledge of formulating data governance objectives and goals;</li> <li>Ability to Communicate and inspire confidence at a senior level with technical and non-technical audiences.</li> </ul> <p><strong>Key Personal Attributes:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Good communication skills, reasoning and analytical ability;</li> <li>Must be collaborative in approach and a team player;</li> <li>Very good at networking and influencing;</li> <li>Willingness to learn new concepts, tools and techniques related to the subject.</li> </ul></div>
